bug.author: kmcgrady
bug.summary: Changes in a widget in an expander closes the expander
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
If I make changes to a widget in an expander, the expander closes. <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
more_widgets = st.beta_expander('More Widgets') with more_widgets: st.text_input("Input Something") <denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
When making a change in the text input, the expander should stay open. <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
When making a change in the text input, the expander closes. <denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
no <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: 0.68
